text: Fairport is a village located in the Town of Perinton, which is part of Monroe County, New York. Fairport is a suburb east of Rochester. In 2005 it was named as one of the "Best Places to Live" by Money Magazine. About 5,501 people lived here since the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Fairport, New York
